name: divided
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
split into two or more opposing groups who cannot agree: The party is deeply divided over fundamental issues, such as immigration and the budget deficit. More than ever we seem to be a divided nation.
More examplesFewer examplesRepublican leaders are badly divided on the plan.The conflict left the country bitterly divided.Scholars are utterly divided on this point.He struggled to preside over a seriously divided Cabinet.I have never known attitudes to be so divided.
